title.english: The Strongest Sage with the Weakest Crest

description:
His strength limited by the magical crest with which he was born, Matthias, the world’s most powerful sage, decides reincarnation is necessary to become the strongest of all. Upon his rebirth as a young boy, Matthias is thrilled to discover he’s been born with the optimal crest for magical combat on his first try! Unfortunately, the world he’s been born into has abysmally poor standards when it comes to magic, and everyone thinks he’s still marked for failure! Now it’s up to Matthias to prove everyone wrong…world’s strongest sage-style!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ปราชญ์หนึ่งในใต้หล้ากับตราสุดอัปยศ

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

node.description: Started off as a composite artist.

fripSide is a Japanese indie pop band. Started in 2002. They also have many other support members.  

On March 15, 2009, nao stated on the fripSide Official Website that she had graduated from fripSide. Sat and nao want to pursue different musical careers, as nao intends to pursue a solo singing career. Meanwhile Sat will continue in fripSide with a new project called, fripside: THE NEXT PROJECT. Seiyuu Yoshino Nanjo took over as the vocalist of fripSide with her debut single "only my railgun", the opening of the anime, To Aru Kagaku no Railgun. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

__Members__
- sat - [Satoshi Yaginuma](https://anilist.co/staff/111757) (八木沼悟志) - (lyrics, synthesizers, composer, arrangement) (2002-present)
- Mao Uesugi (上杉真央) - (vocals) (2022-present)
- Hisayo Abe (阿部寿世) - (vocals) (2022-present)

__Former Members__
- [nao](https://anilist.co/staff/118365/nao) (vocal, lyrics) (2002-2009)
- [Yoshino Nanjo](https://anilist.co/staff/96592/Yoshino-Nanjo) (南條愛乃) - (vocals, lyrics) (2009-2022)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yuki_Nakashim) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nakashima_yuki.official/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/nakashima_yuki/) | [Agency Profile](https://www.beffect.co.jp/talent/yuki/)

A voice actor and the current bassist in the band [Roselia](https://anilist.co/staff/153170/Roselia) as Lisa Imai.

Yuki was born in Wakayama Prefecture and lives in Tokyo. Until middle school she was a junior model for the magazines JS Girls and Sugar Princess Room. She also appeared in different commercials and dramas when she was a child.

She wanted to become a voice actress after seeing Gintama before she entered high school. Yuki was awarded the grand prize together with Takao Kanon in the National Seiyuu Grand Prix held by the seiyuu unit Earth Star Dream in 2014, and as a result she became a member of the unit. She then debuted as a voice actress with the role of Kinako Tanaka in the Teekyuu franchise, as well as starred in the series' stage adaptation.

Yuki was a member of Earth Star Dream until graduating in December 2017, and not long after her graduation the unit got suspended as well. On May 13, 2018, Yuki was then announced as Endou Yurika's replacement as Roselia's bassist and Lisa Imai's voice actor due to Yurika's retirement from the entertainment industry.

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia)

__[Profile](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/fujita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junpei_Fujita)__

Member of the "music production brand" Elements Garden.
Twitter | Website (artist page) __Seima Iwahashi__ is a Japanese composer, arranger, director and orechestrator. He is a member of the music production team, Elements Garden.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).
